title: 10/28/21 DPS Hour 1 Ric Bucher
itunes:title: 10/28/21 DPS Hour 1 Ric Bucher
description:
With Jason Smith and Mike Harmon in for Dan and the Danette’s, the guys recap last night’s Astros win in Game 2 of the 2021 World Series and the late news that Cardinals DE JJ Watt will miss the remainder of the season with a shoulder injury. FS1 NBA Insider Ric Bucher joins the show to talk the Lakers collapse against the Thunder and where they go from that, and what might the future hold for Baker Mayfield? 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
